sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Github, Linkedin, Twitter, Mail, MapPin, Phone, Clock } from "lucide-react"; const Footer: React.FC = () => { const year = new Date().getFullYear(); const [hoveredSocial, setHoveredSocial] = useState(null); const socialLinks = [ { icon: Github, url: "https://github.com/", label: "GitHub", gradient: "from-gray-700 to-gray-900" }, { icon: Linkedin, url: "https://linkedin.com/", label: "LinkedIn", gradient: "from-blue-500 to-blue-700" }, { icon: Twitter, url: "https://twitter.com/", label: "Twitter", gradient: "from-sky-400 to-blue-500" }, { icon: Mail, url: "mailto:info@collabryta.com", label: "Email", gradient: "from-purple-500 to-pink-600" }, ]; const footerLinks = { Product: [ { name: "Features", url: "/features" }, { name: "Integrations", url: "/integrations" }, { name: "Pricing", url: "/pricing" }, { name: "Changelog", url: "/changelog" }, { name: "Roadmap", url: "/roadmap" }, ], Company: [ { name: "About Us", url: "/about" }, { name: "Careers", url: "/careers" }, { name: "Blog", url: "/blog" }, { name: "Press Kit", url: "/press" }, { name: "Contact", url: "/contact" }, ], Resources: [ { name: "Documentation", url: "/docs" }, { name: "API Reference", url: "/api" }, { name: "Guides", url: "/guides" }, { name: "Community", url: "/community" }, { name: "Support", url: "/support" }, ], Legal: [ { name: "Privacy Policy", url: "/privacy" }, { name: "Terms of Service", url: "/terms" }, { name: "Cookie Policy", url: "/cookies" }, { name: "GDPR", url: "/gdpr" }, { name: "Licenses", url: "/licenses" }, ], }; const contactInfo = [ { icon: MapPin, text: "San Francisco, CA" }, { icon: Phone, text: "+1 (555) 123-4567" }, { icon: Clock, text: "Mon-Fri, 9AM-6PM PST" }, ]; return (
{/* Animated Wave Divider */}
{/* Main Footer Content */}
{/* Brand Section - Takes 4 columns */}
{/* Logo */}

Collabryta

Collaborate. Innovate. Succeed.

{/* Description */}

Transform the way your team works together with our cutting-edge collaboration platform. Built for modern teams who demand excellence.

{/* Contact Info */}
{contactInfo.map((info, idx) => (
{info.text}
))}
{/* Social Links */}
{socialLinks.map(({ icon: Icon, url, label, gradient }) => ( setHoveredSocial(label)} onMouseLeave={() => setHoveredSocial(null)} className={` relative w-11 h-11 rounded-xl flex items-center justify-center transition-all duration-300 group overflow-hidden ${hoveredSocial === label ? 'scale-110 shadow-lg' : 'bg-slate-100 hover:bg-slate-200'} `} >
))}
{/* Links Grid - Takes 8 columns */}
{Object.entries(footerLinks).map(([category, links]) => (

{category}

    {links.map((link) => (
  • {link.name}
    • ))}
))}
{/* Bottom Bar */}

Â© {year} Collabryta Inc. All rights reserved.

Sitemap Accessibility System Status
); }; export default Footer;
